The dino who gave Ramulus the ride, nodds, and then shows him a cave while =
looking to it casually then back to him.  Night Shift smiles.

"Ohh yeah, t=
hat cave, it's big enough for all of us, just help me get in there and we c=
an wait out the storm for a while. As far as I know my headlights still wor=
k, so I can give ya the light ya need ta work in.  And we don't have ta wor=
ry about hauln' aft anywhere, we'll be dry in there."

Rat Trap nodds.

"Gr=
eat idea.  Next time, try not ta play speedster okay? That's his problem, R=
amulus, he thinks just because he's got the wheels, he can play hot rod wit=
h the rest of 'em.  Now look where it got 'em."

Night Shift Sighs.

"Yeah,=
 I know, I know. I'm a workn' vehicle, not a race car. Next time, I'll defi=
nitely respect my specs."

 Heeey, I got an idea Ramulus. I bet these guys can help us get Night Shift=
